part_5.question_text: Because his secretary had a doctor’s appointment that day, Chad had to finish the report by ___.
If he had studied harder in university, he ___easily won admission to medical school.
The Parents Association ___ that children not be allowed to watch evening television without supervision.
Many politicians ___realize the connection between industrialization and loss of farm land.
There is a large variety of restaurants___located on King’s street.
The Gravy Company will be ___ its new variety of flavored potato chips in the winter catalog.
The essence of the data coming from this collaboration will be shared ___ between both parties before the results of it become open to the public.
The manager will be able to answer all questions through the e-mail for the _____ of the week.
___ the three charity programs share much in common, unmistakable differences exist in their funding method.
The initiative ___ by the World Wildlife Federation to reduce unnecessary fees at the airport will be very well received.
After our company started exporting the DS455 internationally, our revenue has ___ doubled.
Knowing how to use the roller properly and how to spread the paint ___ on the wall need a practice.
DS Investment has been gaining market share and is now Embassy Printing’s ___ competitor.
The price of our multi-steel cable has been ___ by 40%, from $3.55 to $2.30 per meter.
Tonight’s dinner special comes with a baked potato, salad and drink of your choices — all for ___ $26.40.
The president put the ___ about changes in company holidays in the department newsletter.
Along with the beautiful forests and delicious food, Safari Island also offers ___ outdoor activities for travelers.
We at Electro Land apologize ___ the delay in delivery of your new computer.
Many people in this neighborhood are dependent on their own car for transportation to get to ___ or school.
Ms. Ross said she needed to take care of all her personal ___ before returning to school tomorrow morning.
Mr. Horris ___ missed the basket in the company basketball game.
The fishing export show held yearly will be ___ by the Human Resources Division.
WOLF Technology has decided that it is not in___ best interest to merge with FOX Appliances.
The PS3 company has ___ not released the annual revenues for the last year.
___ of the people who has followed our company over the past years thought that this product would be so popular.
Brian Smith, the president of Smith Gaming, will inform you ___ the exact date of the new product being released in a week.
All articles provided in the magazine must be checked carefully ___ publication.
___ pay increases cannot be expected unless next year’s budget shows that there is a surplus of funds.
The parking area behind the Cluster Building will remain closed until the south and west side of the parking lots are all ___.
Upgrading the computer software at Eagle River Training Center may ___ to a better learning experience for the students.

part_6.paragraph: APRIL 3—The Sherwood Tourism Commission is hosting its 2nd Annual Nature Photography Competition, which is open to residents of all ages. ---135---. These submissions should be sent by e-mail to nature@citysherwood.gov. The photograph must be your ---136--- work and cannot infringe on the copyrights of others. The winners in several categories will receive cash prizes, and their images may be used in promotional materials. The theme of the ---137--- this year is “Water,” and planners hope that participants can find inspiration from the natural beauty of Sherwood’s wetlands and riverside. Individuals may submit up to three photos for consideration. The entries ---138--- by a panel that includes the owner of the Garmont Gallery and several prominent artists. For more information, visit www.citysherwood.gov/nature.

part_6.paragraph:
Westward Manufacturing
297 Stone Lane
West Grove, PA 19390
To Whom It May Concern,
I am writing to recommend my former colleague Andrew Cho for the position of inventory manager. Mr. Cho joined the warehouse division at Amera Limited five years ago. It has been very ---143--- to have him on our team.
He is very personable and friendly as a coworker. Additionally, he was a dedicated worker committed to bringing our team’s goals to fruition. ---144---. During his employment at Amera Limited, Mr. Cho developed a unique system for monitoring inventory, which improved shipping times by nearly 30%. He ---145--- traveled to our other major distribution sites across the country to oversee their implementation of the system.
I highly recommend Mr. Cho for the position at your company. You would benefit greatly from his exceptional ---146---. I would be more than happy to answer any further questions you may have. I can be reached by phone at (708) 555-2940, extension 47.
Warmest regards,
Walter Schmidt
Shipping and Receiving Manager
Amera Limited

Walter Dowdy  09:59 I want to discuss some details about the upcoming warehouse expansion. Jane Frazier 10:00 Can you be a little more specific? Walter Dowdy  10:03 We need to discuss where you'd like your inventory moved while the work is being done.  Walter Dowdy 10:04 I also wanted to update you on the finalized construction schedule, and the hours my crew will be there.  Jane Frazier  10:05 I've got a fairly busy schedule today, but don't worry. I'll make room for it. It is important. Jane Frazier  10:06 I have a meeting at 2:15 P.M. that I think I can cancel. Does that time work for you?  Walter Dowdy  10:09Yes, that's perfect. I'll come to your office.

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following e-mail.   E-MAIL MESSAGE To:Cara Turnbull (cturnbull@duomail.com) From:Martin Thorpe (martinthorpe@yca.org) Date:July 5Subject:Culture & Arts FestivalDear Ms. Turnbull, I am writing to inform you that The Picciotto Five has been selected to take part in our upcoming Culture & Arts Festival on August 2. As I mentioned to you following your performance in Coopertown, the festival aims to showcase the best musicians, actors, and dancers in the state. I will be visiting your hometown of Edgemont next week, and I would like to meet in person with you and your members there to find out what routine you plan to perform at our event. I particularly enjoyed the energetic choreography and soundtrack you used while dancing in Coopertown. If your performance in Yaleton next month is a success, I may ask you to take part in a similar festival in Ludlow the following month. Please let me know when you are available to meet next week.Regards,Martin Thorpe

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following notice.   Autumn at Holmes Gallery! We are pleased to announce that the annual sculpture competition returns this year, featuring entries from both local and international artists. Running as an exhibition from September 19 to November 1, Tuesday through Sunday, the event is open to the public and everyone is invited to come and view this year’s pieces. The winner will be announced on the final day of the exhibition at 7 P.M. with the gallery’s owner, Regina Entwhistle, presenting the $10,000 prize to the winner at a special reception. The entries will be on display in the main hall for the duration of the competition, after which the gallery will close for about two weeks, marking the end of the third session. It will reopen on November 18 for the final session of the year, with a rare chance to see the most complete set of watercolor paintings from renowned artist Rennie Deveaux.

answers: (A) She will personally oversee the exhibition setup.

questions.correct_answer: (D) She will participate in a ceremony on November 1.

questions.correct_answer: (A)It will run four exhibition sessions this year.

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following e-mail.  To: Margaret Badger (mbadger@zmail.net) From:SQA Travel (noreply@sqatravel.com)Date:April 15Subject: Claim your rewardDear Ms. Badger, We at SQA Travel are always looking for opportunities to reward our most loyal customers. Providing high levels of customer service is one of the core values of our brand, and seeing the same customers return to us to book future trips is one of the ways that we can be sure that we're maintaining our high standards. We have noticed from studying your account that you have already booked three trips through us this year——the Caribbean in both January and February, and to Argentina in March. I hope you had a great time. As a thank you for your loyalty, you are now eligible for a free upgrade to a first-class seat on the next flight that you book with us. However, please note that this offer is available only on international flights and cannot be claimed on any flights traveling within the country. To take advantage of this offer, simply quote the reward code MXT3202 when booking your next flight over the phone. Once again, we would like to thank you for choosing SQA Travel as your travel operator.Sincerely,  Billy Riggins  Customer Service Manager  SQA Travel

answers: (A) To inform Ms. Badger about a new tour package

(D) To ask Ms. Badger to submit a document
questions.correct_answer: (C) To offer Ms. Badger a special deal

part_7.paragraph:
refer to the following article.California Traveler MagazineFeatured Destination of the Week: Sea Lion Caves, Florence, Oregon 
By Shirley BertramCalifornia natives know all about their own state’s golden shoreline and picturesque national parks, but one often overlooked point of interest, found just a few miles across the state border, is the Sea Lion Caves in Oregon. Here, visitors can view these magnificent creatures from the safety of underground viewing windows. According to one tourist’s account, “The Sea Lion Caves provide an opportunity to truly see how these animals act in their natural habitat. I found it mesmerizing.” The caves, which have been receiving visitors for more than five decades, are entered via use of an elevator underground.
-[1]- Located near the coastal town of Florence, the caves are easily accessible from the main highway and feature many signs offering wildlife information, making this an ideal destination for the whole family during the school holidays. -[2]- Visitors should book tickets in advance to avoid disappointment, as the caves can become quite crowded during peak tourist seasons. Jackets are advisable because the temperature drops considerably underground. I would also suggest arriving in the morning, as the sea lions are often at their most active during this time.
-[3]- After watching the sea lions feasting on fish, visitors are bound to feel hungry themselves. The nearby Caves Restaurant provides budget-friendly options, with plenty of seafood and vegetarian choices. It also boasts an extensive dessert menu. -[4]- This is particularly true for those with young children.California Traveler rating:  9/10.

questions.question_text: The word “account” in paragraph 1 is closest in meaning to
What can be inferred about the column?
answers: (A) It typically focuses on destinations in Oregon.
(B) It is co-written in collaboration with other reporters.
(C) It runs on a weekly basis in a magazine.
(D) It was only recently added to the publication.
questions.correct_answer: (C) It runs on a weekly basis in a magazine.

questions.question_text: What is indicated about the Sea Lion Caves?
answers: (A) They are sponsored by a local restaurant.
(B) They are closed during the winter.

questions.question_text: In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong?   “The marine-themed interior and the costumed staff will make all visits an unforgettable experience.”

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following online chat discussion.   Lucia Rohn  9:42 A.M.  I’m sure you’re aware that the Health Inspection Agency has introduced new food storage procedures. They go into effect next month.  Bill Oswalt   9:43 A.M.  Right. And it’s not just for restaurants like ours. The policy applies to other businesses as well. Brian Dimarco  9:45 A.M.  Yes, it applies to any business that cooks or serves food. So, hotels, catering companies, cafés, and bars are affected too. Bill Oswalt  9:46 A.M.   Okay, so what exactly is different? I know that inspections will now occur twice a year instead of just annually. But, what specifically will health agents check?  Lucia Rohn   9:48 A.M.  For one thing, in the past, chemicals needed to be stored separately from food, but now they have to be kept in a locked room. Brian Dimarco  9:50 A.M.  Storage rules in general are much stricter. Products have always been dated upon delivery, but now we must ensure that we store new items behind the old ones. And, raw meat and cooked meat must be kept on different shelves in the fridges.  Bill Oswalt   9:53 A.M.  That is a little overwhelming. Will we be able to implement all of this?  Lucia Rohn   9:55 A.M.  I’m going to write a memo explaining the changes. Staff members can refer back to it as often as they need to.  Brian Dimarco   9:57 A.M.  I’m willing to take each of the staff members into the kitchen and actually show them the steps to follow these new regulations.   Lucia Rohn  9:59 A.M.  Actually, that sounds helpful. I accept the offer. It’s easier to remember things you’ve seen and not just read.   SEND

questions.question_text: What type of business do the writers work for?
What is suggested about the Health Inspection Agency?
answers: (C)It will increase the frequency of inspections.
(D)It only supervises businesses that cook food.
questions.correct_answer: (C)It will increase the frequency of inspections.

questions.question_text: What is NOT one of the new regulations?
answers: (A)Some types of cooked and raw foods cannot be stored together.
(D)Labeled items must be stacked in a specific order.

questions.question_text: At 9:59 A.M., what does Ms. Rohn mean when she writes, “I accept the offer”?
answers: (A)She likes the idea of a visual demonstration.
(C)She will take a coworker to a health inspector.
(D)She agrees to receive help with a staff memo.
questions.correct_answer: (A)She likes the idea of a visual demonstration.

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following e-mail.To:(customerservice@grandorchardhotel.com)From:Charlotte Brown (c.brown@speedmail.com)Date:December 21Subject: My stay with theGrand Orchard HotelDear Grand Orchard Hotel, I am writing to bring to your attention my unpleasant experience during my stay at your hotel last weekend. — [1] — I stayed with you after I missed my 4 P.M. flight out of Bangkok on Saturday, December 19. Instead of trying to catch the next available flight, I decided to look for a hotel near the airport and leave for my business trip to Incheon and Seoul on Sunday. I thought I could relax and forget about my hectic day, but I was wrong. When I checked in, your front desk receptionist, Marvin Shamitra, gave me a dinner buffet voucher. He said it was a complimentary gift from the hotel. However, when I presented the voucher at your restaurant, the waiter told me it had already expired. I didn’t want to argue with him, so I paid for my meal. — [2] —After dinner, I went to my room to watch TV, but it wouldn’t turn on. I decided to take a warm bath before going to bed instead. While trying to empty the bath, I noticed that the drain in the bathtub was clogged. Even worse, when I lifted the comforter, I saw some ants on my bed. When I finally complained about my room, I waited thirty minutes for a new one. — [3] — I have been traveling overseas frequently since I was fourteen, and I must say that your hotel is the worst I have ever been in. — [4] — Furthermore, I expect immediate action to be taken in regard to my complaint.Sincerely,Charlotte BrownPublic Relations Manager, Jakarta Forwarders

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of the e-mail?
answers: (C)To book a hotel room for one guest
(D)To inquire about the facilities of a hotel

questions.question_text: Where is the Grand Orchard Hotel located?
What is suggested about Ms. Brown?
answers: (D)She booked her room with a travel agent.

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following press release and e-mail. Dynamix Chemicals Continues Climb to Prominence March  Dynamix Chemicals began as a small start-up in Jaipur with a laboratory staff of fewer than thirty people. Struggling for several years, the company finally began thriving after the launch of Sculptio, its now best-selling product. Sculptio is a non-toxic substance that can be molded into any shape while remaining flexible after it sets. The product’s versatility led to its use in a wide range of sectors, including everything from furniture manufacturing to cable installation.  The company is hoping to repeat Sculptio’s success with the much-anticipated product launch of Traction-Pro, a spray-on coating that makes surfaces less slippery. To keep up with the anticipated production needs, Dynamix plans to build a new manufacturing plant in Surat. This plant will focus mainly on Traction-Pro, while the main plant in Delhi will continue producing the bulk of Dynamix’s existing product line. Construction is set to begin next month, and the opening of the plant will result in the hiring of more than three hundred additional employees, a welcome boost to the local economy. Operations will be overseen initially by Omar Khan, who was promoted to facility management director two years ago after he spent four years as a factory foreman at the Delhi plant. Should Traction-Pro have the enthusiastic reception anticipated by market experts, Dynamix will have sufficient capital to begin competing with industry giants such as Harlan Industrial and Pierce International.___________________________To:  R&D Department (rdstaff@dynamixc.com)   From:  CarlaAdams (cadams@dynamixc.com )   Date:March 23  Subject:  Mark your calendars Greetings, everyone! On behalf of the management team at Dynamix Chemicals, I would like to extend an invitation to a special banquet on April 25. This event is being held to thank you for the dedication and hard work you contributed to the development of Traction-Pro. Without your cooperation and innovation, we would not have been able to move forward. We believe that Traction-Pro will be a game-changer for Dynamix Chemicals, allowing us to establish our brand as a leader in the industry.The banquet will be held at the headquarters building in Mumbai, and you are welcome to bring your family members. CEO Stuart Baldwin will be giving a brief speech on the company’s mission for the next year, and he’ll also talk about his visit to the groundbreaking ceremony for our new construction plant, which will take place on April 19. Please reply to this e-mail by the end of the week to confirm your attendance. We hope you will all be able to join us.Sincerely,  Carla AdamsAdministrative DirectorDynamix Chemicals

questions.question_text: According to the press release, what was the cause of Dynamix Chemicals’s success?
answers: (B)It developed a material with many uses.
questions.correct_answer: (B)It developed a material with many uses.

questions.question_text: What is NOT indicated as an upcoming change at Dynamix Chemicals?

answers: (A)To give a tour of a manufacturing plant
(B)To attract investors on a larger scale

part_7.paragraph:
refer to the following advertisement and article.The Boniface Experience: The Reunion Tour November 23
After splitting up and going on hiatus from the music industry 5 years ago, the members of The Boniface Experience are delighted to announce a reunion tour, which will see the musicians showcase their talents throughout Europe. The band will be supported on all dates by the New York band Bennett & The Hymas, in addition to four featured guests who will serve as the respective opening acts at each of the gigs. The concerts are being staged by tour promoter UNG Productions, and tickets are sure to sell out fast.Tour ScheduleDateVenueFeatured Guest01/16World Cup Stadium, BerlinJoe Blackenwolf01/19Victory Park, ParisPierre van Bierhoff01/23Hyde Park, LondonRobert Stark01/25Crystal Lake, MalagaJuan Villasenor
________________________________The Portland Gazette The Boniface Experience Tour Announcement Delights FansBy Jennifer Tully
November 24——of The Boniface Experience were left crushed five years ago when the band took a break from the music industry due to what was termed “a conflict between band members.” Last night, the same fans were celebrating following a press conference hosted by UNG Productions, in which the band announced that it would be re-forming to produce a new album. It will also embark on a European tour early next year. Lead guitarist Peter Turquoise also confirmed that “all problems within the band have been resolved.” It is rumored that the source of the conflict was a disagreement over the future direction of the band between Turquoise and drummer Andre Symonds. But with Symonds having left the music industry three months ago to pursue an acting career, the remaining members now feel that they are in a position to work together once again. Turquoise went on to say that a new member will join the group. Ryan Nelsen is to assume Symond’s role as drummer.
The Boniface Experience is a five-piece rock and roll band that originally formed in 2001 in Austin, Texas. These artists have come a long way since playing in small venues to pay off their college debts. After being recommended by talent scout Peter Wisdon and signing to the record label Lilypad. Records, they went on to enjoy huge success both at home and abroad, racking up five number one albums in the U.S. and three in the U.K. Fans are now hoping that the band can enjoy similar success following its return to the music scene. As a long-time fan myself, I am particularly looking forward to seeing these artists in action on January 23.
For ticketing information for the forthcoming tour, fans can visit www.ungproductions.org.

questions.question_text: What is indicated about The Boniface Experience?
answers: (A)It will play a concert in New York.
(B)It will perform in various record stores.
(C)It has just released a new album.

questions.question_text: What is true about Juan Villasenor?
answers: (A)His first performance will take place in Berlin.
(B)He will perform before Bennett & The Hymas.
(C)He is a new member of The Boniface Experience.
(D)He has canceled his participation in a tour.
questions.correct_answer: (B)He will perform before Bennett & The Hymas.

questions.question_text: According to the article, what problem did The Boniface Experience encounter?
answers: (A)The artists had a dispute with a record company.
(B)It experienced a drop in record sales.
(D)Its lead guitarist decided to leave the band.

part_7.paragraph:
refer to the following advertisement, e-mail and form.Kerouac Motors: We’ve Got the Car for You!
If you need a new car, but don’t want to spend a lot of money, then come to Kerouac Motors. We are in the business of buying and selling used vehicles. Our cars may not be brand new, but we guarantee that they are in great condition. All vehicles are serviced when they arrive on our lot and they are sold with a one-year warranty. Extended two-year warranties are available for an additional $1,000. We also do repairs and order replacement parts right here on the lot.
For a small sample of just a few of the vehicles we have available, see the list below. The prices advertised are not final and can be negotiated.
Canyonero: $5,000
Panther 1A3: $7,500
Quadrail X7: $10,000
Tardis 250:$13,500
Come visit Kerouac Motors and find your new car! Our address is 1807 Joanne Lane, Acton, MA 01720.
______________________________E-MAIL MESSAGETo:  Elliot Salinas (elliot@kerouacmotors.com)From:  Jessica Harland (jhar@customernet.com)Date: October 21Subject:  Purchasing a vehicle
Dear Mr. Salinas:
I am contacting you because a friend of mine recommended your services. Apparently you have a reputation as a kind and patient salesperson. I am looking to purchase a different vehicle because mine keeps breaking down. I’d like to replace it with a newer model. I was hoping that you would be able to help me find something suitable.
However, I’m on a tight budget, so I don’t want to pay any more than $_7,000 for a used vehicle. According to an advertisement I saw recently, your company has at least one vehicle that might be suitable. I’d like to schedule a time for me to meet with you. Then you can tell me more about it.
Thank you,
Jessica Harland

part_7.paragraph:
refer to the following e-mails and Web-site.To: Nicole Weld (nicole@nicoleweld.com)From:  Gregg Routier (routier@powerq.com)Date: November 25Subject: PowerQ Wireless Router
Dear Ms. Weld,
I am contacting you on behalf of PowerQ Electronics. I’ve been reading your blog, and your product reviews are an excellent source of reliable information for customers. I was wondering if you would be willing to write a review for one of our products, the PowerQ Wireless Router.
This router features a new design. There are now four different Ethernet ports that enable you to connect multiple wired devices like desktop computers. Also included is a USB port to plug in a printer that can be shared across the wireless network. We’d like more customers to know about this product, and we’d specifically like you to inform them that the PowerQ Wireless Router also comes with removable antennas. If you need to extend your wireless range, you can purchase and attach higher-performing antennas in their place.
If you are willing to write this review for us, please give me your mailing address, and I will send you the product to try.
Thank you for your assistance,
Gregg Routier,
Advertising Manager
PowerQ Electronics
_____________________________
www.nicoleweld.comProduct Review: PowerQ Wireless RouterPosted by: Nicole Weld
Posted on: November 29PRODUCT FEATURES:
The most unique element is the two receivers that can be detached and reattached
The two-year warranty entitles customers to a refund if the product starts to malfunction
Ships within three days to anywhere in the continental United StatesPRODUCT RATINGS:FeaturePoorAcceptableGoodVery GoodExcellentDesign  x  Function    xInstallation   x Price x   
This product was sent to me for review by PowerQ, but the opinions expressed in this post are entirely my honest opinion.
____________________________To: Nicole Weld (nicole@nicoleweld.com)From:  Jason Martinelli (jason@mail.net)Date: November 30Subject: Inaccurate product review
Dear Ms. Weld,
I am an avid reader of your Web site, and usually I trust your assessment of the quality of products. However, I was very disappointed with your most recent review about the PowerQ Wireless Router.
The instructions included with the router do not include a few necessary steps at the beginning. An electronic expert would know what to do, but the average consumer might not, and it could affect whether or not they set up their router properly. Therefore, customers are being misled with the “very good” rating. I think the product should have been rated lower in this area.
I don’t expect you to change your review entirely, but I suggest that you modify it by inserting a few sentences explaining about the instructions. This way, consumers will be warned in advance.
Thank you,
Jason Martinelli

questions.question_text: What was the main purpose of the first e-mail?
answers: (A) To compliment Ms. Weld on her Web site
(C) To inquire about samples of Ms. Weld’s writing
(D) To advertise a new electronic device

answers: (C)  It offers shipping to domestic locations.

answers: (B) It is designed for novice users.

part_7.paragraph: refer to the following job posting, e-mail and information.    The Brimstone is Hiring! The Brimstone has been a main feature in the Palm Springs community for thirty years. We have a reputation for excellent food and even better customer service. We are currently in need of a new server to join our team at The Brimstone. If you are a friendly and outgoing person with exceptional people skills then we want to hear from you! Previous experience working as a sever is desirable, but not a necessity. We will train the right candidate. You must be sixteen years of age or older and be willing to work morning, afternoon, and evening shifts during the week and on weekends. If you are interested, please visit the restaurant at 1771 Coleman Avenue and ask to speak to the manager, Richard Zimmerman._____________________________To:  Martha Forshee ( martha@younet.com )    From:   Richard Zimmerman (richzim@thebrimstone.com)   Date: October 19  Subject:  Welcome to the team!  Attached: Employee manualDear Martha, I’m so pleased that you’ve accepted our offer of employment. I was quite impressed with your previous restaurant background, and especially with your engaging personality. I think you will make a great addition to our restaurant. As you know, your first day of work will be Saturday, October 25. For your reference, I have attached the first page of the employee manual for you to familiarize yourself with before you start. More detailed information regarding the specific roles and responsibilities will be explained to you during your training after you’ve started. You will shadow a different employee for every shift during your first week, but the person in charge for your first shift on the 25th will be Sam McCormick. He will guide you through your first lunch service. We are thrilled to welcome you to the team! Best regards,   Richard Zimmerman Manager,  The Brimstone ___________________________ Employee Manual  1. WORKING HOURS  Breakfast shifts are from 7:00 A.M. to 11:00 A.M. Lunch shifts are from 11:00 A.M. to 3:00 P.M. Dinner shifts are from 4:00 P.M. to 9:00 P.M.  Night shifts are from 6:00 P.M. to 1:00 A.M.  2. ATTENDANCE POLICY   All time off must be requested and approved by a manager, in writing, in advance. If employees cannot make their scheduled shifts, it is their responsibility to find a replacement from our employees.  3. DRESS CODE  The standard clothing for all servers at The Brimstone restaurant is a pair of running shoes, black pants (or a skirt), and a red top with The Brimstone’s logo printed on it.

answers: (A) It is looking to hire several new employees.
(B) It recently opened a second location.
(C) It will open a cooking program.
(D) It has been in business for three decades.
questions.correct_answer: (D) It has been in business for three decades.
